trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> evento se produce después de que se cierra un formulario, ya sea por el usuario, a través de la interfaz de usuario (UI), o mediante programación, a través de llamadas a métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> (clase), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> en la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> clase.

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Si un formulario tiene secundarios o formularios con propietario, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> evento también se genera para cada uno de ellos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs> class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs> clase proporciona datos para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> propiedad proporciona la razón por qué se cierra el formulario.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de este tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, un controlador de eventos notifica la aparición de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este informe le ayuda a obtener información cuando se produce el evento y puede ayudarle a depurar.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para informar sobre varios eventos o sobre eventos que se producen con frecuencia, considere la posibilidad de reemplazar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> con <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o agregar el mensaje a un multilínea <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Para ejecutar el ejemplo de código, péguelo en un proyecto que contiene una instancia del tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> denominado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, asegúrese de que el controlador de eventos esté asociado el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> que representa la razón por la que se ha cerrado el formulario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El `closeReason` parámetro se utiliza para inicializar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica por qué se ha cerrado el formulario.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" /> enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores enumerados de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> se puede cerrar debido a diversas razones tanto iniciadas por el usuario como mediante programación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> propiedad indica el motivo del cierre.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de este miembro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, un controlador de eventos notifica la aparición de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este informe le ayuda a obtener información cuando se produce el evento y puede ayudarle a depurar.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para informar sobre varios eventos o sobre eventos que se producen con frecuencia, considere la posibilidad de reemplazar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> con <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o agregar el mensaje a un multilínea <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Para ejecutar el ejemplo de código, péguelo en un proyecto que contiene una instancia del tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> denominado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, asegúrese de que el controlador de eventos esté asociado el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.
